definitions.title: f. pron. of 3 s.
definitions.body: he, she, it (= BH [[הוּא]], [[הִיא]]; Zinj. and Palm. (once) [[הא]], Palm. (usually) Nab. Eg. Aram. [[הו]], f. ´[[ה]]:, Lzb:257, S-C:Pap. A 1, 12+; A 4, C 9 +. The pl. is [[אִנּוּן]], q.v.);—he, she, it, Da 2:21 …[[וְהוּא מְהַשְׁנֵא]]: and he will change, etc., v:Da 2:22, v:Da 2:44, Da 6:5, Da 7:7, Da 7:24, Ezr 5:8; Da 2:32 [[הוּא חַלְמָא]] that image (nom. pend.); Da 4:19 [[אַנְתָּה הוּא]] thou art it. Resuming the subj. with emph. (BH

definitions.title: 2 b
definitions.body: ) Da 2:47, Da 6:17; resuming the subj. in predication (ib.

definitions.title: 3 b
definitions.body: ) Da 2:20 [[חָכְמְתָא וּגְבוּרְתָּא דִּי־לֵהּ הִיא]] it is his, v:Da 2:28. Anticipating the subj. (ib.

definitions.title: 4 a
definitions.body: ) Da 2:9 [[חֲדָא הִיא דָֽתְכוֹן]]; with a pron. (ib.

definitions.title: 4 b
definitions.body: ) Da 2:38 …[[אַנְתְּה הוּא]]: thou art the head of gold Da 5:13; Da 3:15 …[[מָן הוּא אֱלָהּ]]: who is the god . . . ? (so pl. [[אִנּוּן]] Ezr 5:4); Da 4:27 …[[הֲלָא דָא הִיא]]: (ib.

definitions.title: 2 c
definitions.body: ), Ezr 6:15 (so …[[דִּי אִנוּן]]: Da 7:17). [Cf. in Targum Ex 14:25, Ex 15:11, 2Sa 20:19, 2Sa 24:17, Ps 43:2, Ps 63:4, Ps 66:3 +.] Affirming existence (BH
